update.detail:
A new version of HTM Studio (%name) is available.
To install the update, the application needs to be closed.
Do you want to close the application now or later?

button.no: Wait until I close the app

close_application.singular: There is still one active model running. The active model will be interrupted upon quitting and it won’t be possible to restart the model. All results obtained so far will be persisted.
close_application.plural: There are still %modelCount active models running. All models will be interrupted upon quitting and it won’t be possible to restart these models. All results obtained so far will be persisted.

delete.title: Remove File
delete.message: Removing this file from HTM Studio will delete the associated HTM models. Are you sure you want to remove the file? Your original file will not be touched.

create.loading: Preparing to create an HTM model. This might take a few seconds.
create.title: HTM analysis for %s
create.recommendAggregate: We found the best parameters for the HTM ​and your data will be aggregated​. While you can tweak them in the advanced settings below, we recommend that you proceed with these parameters for the analysis.
create.recommendRaw: We found the best parameters for the HTM​. While you can tweak them in the advanced settings below, we recommend that you proceed with these parameters for the analysis.
create.paramFinderError:
We were unable to find parameters for this metric.
Please contact support at htm-studio@numenta.com.

advanced.description: Be aware that changing the settings below will impact the HTM results.

aggData.label: Aggregate data
aggData.tooltip: Combines data, which might reduce noise and improve results.

aggWindow.label: Aggregation window
aggWindow.tooltip: The bigger the window, the more the data is aggregated.

aggMethod.label: Aggregation method
aggMethod.tooltip: How the data will be combined in the window.

delete.title: Delete Model Results
delete.message: Deleting this model will delete the associated model results. Are you sure you want to delete this model?

chart.empty: Select a metric from the left menu.
